name: hnpwa-vanilla
description: HN PWA build with no framework

scripts.bundle:watch: microbundle watch --output public --target browser --format cjs --sourcemap false
scripts.build: rm -rf public; npm run bundle; npm run copy-assets; npm run bundle:sw; npm run html-minify
scripts.deploy: npm run build; firebase deploy --project hnpwa-vanilla
scripts.dev: (npm run copy-assets & npm run bundle:sw & npm run bundle:watch & npm run serve)

author: Cristian Bote
